title: Lubcub62
author: Lubcub62
content: Everyone must be feeling cold now seeing bitcoin keep falling. But I will endure this cold weather because I see the sun will rise soon.brrrrrrrrr.why are you afraid to buy btc now?and when Ath we are not afraid to buy btc? so why now at 20k are we scared?

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: I’m not scared at all. I’ve been buying all the way down from 35k to where we are now. This is how the smart people make money, buy on the way down & sell some in a bull market.
